attributes.action: bring back capital punishment for those who commit treason or terror attacks against The United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Everyday, we await a new attack on our country and our soldiers's lives are being risked for no apparent reason. It's about time that the people who attack our country in order to cause maximum damage and chaos do not get a trial that costs the tax payer money or get a warm cell with decent food in a prison! Gordon Brown should reintroduce the sentence of capital punishment and condemn terrorists to death to show that Britain has firm policies against terrorism and to gain justice for the families that lose their relatives in grave circumstances.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
